channel.title: Errors

item.title: Errors
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

im trying to add this

if(playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll="Admin playerName+ has logged in."; }

onto this

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players."; if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("i metal i")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner i metal i has logged in."; if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("n0vamage")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner n0vamage has logged in."; if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kawasaki")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-Owner Kawasaki has logged in.";

but it brings up some very stranger errors

[code]client.java:8968: ‘)’ expected
catchtry(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
^
client.java:8968: not a statement
catchtry(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
^
client.java:8968: ‘;’ expected
catchtry(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
^
client.java:8659: ‘try’ without ‘catch’ or ‘finally’
try{
^
client.java:9009: illegal start of expression
public void loggedinpm(){
^
5 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[code]

any idea what im doing wrong here?[/code][/code]

Read full topic
